definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="LashingAmplifier3" type="Boolean">LashingAmplifier3</variable><variable id="ThirdLashing" type="Number">ThirdLashing</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="240" y="-1"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Windrunner1</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:lashingAmount</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Skybreaker1</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:lashingAmount</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
